title: krSNa pAhi
sahitya:
anupallavi



1:  krSNa pAhi jita krSANO pAhi krSNa vrSNikuladIpa viSNO pAhi
 caraNam 2    atyanta sukumAra sAdhu shIla vara shrutyanta khElana gOpabAla lIla
 caraNam 3    brndAraka muni brnda vandya pAda brndAvanacara vENurasa vinOda
 caraNam 4    satyabhAmA kuca kumkumAnkitAnga satyakAma  sankanuta pAda ganga
 caraNam 5    paramahamsa mAnasa vilAsa hamsa parama pAvana nAma bhAvita hamsa
